title: Coronavirus: Reading doctor's death blamed on 'lack of PPE'
description: Dr Peter Tun's family say he might have lived if he had a "proper protective mask".
content:
Image copyrightFamily HandoutImage caption
 Dr Peter Tun had worked at Royal Berkshire Hospital in Reading for over 21 years
The family of a doctor thought to have died of Covid-19 has blamed his death on a lack of protective equipment.
